dc:title: News from Town and Country
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Homey descriptions of life on Mott Street: Christmas gifts received, their needs, a priest who joined the bread line and a wild new year's eve. At the farm, an ice storm creates some adventure and with January comes the peak of winter. Asks prayers for the new year.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 330 1938-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
